CustomField.description: Indicates this Donor has an alternate Enroll ID that is their legacy Donor Number from an acquired/merged donation Center and legacy system. These existing legacy donors use their 'old donor number' in the enrollment code field on the BECS form the first visit they have after go live. This will connect them in the CRM to the BECS/NL generated new donor_number coming from that system.
CustomField.label: isLegacyDonor
